definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: Ps 62:4 wall (√ unknown);—abs. ´[[ק]]: Nu 22:25 +, [[קִר]] Is 22:5; cstr. [[קִיר]] 1Ki 6:5 +; pl. [[קִירוֹת]] 1Ki 6:16 +, cstr. id., v:1Ki 6:5 +; sf. [[קִירׂתָיו]] Ex 30:3 +, etc.;—wall, esp. as flat surface:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: inner surface, Am 5:19, 1Sa 18:11 + 9 t., + (of temple) 1Ki 6:15 a + v:1Ki 6:15 b (but rd. [[קוֹרוֹת]] beams, with LXX The Kit Benz), v:1Ki 6:16, v:1Ki 6:27, v:1Ki 6:27 + 6 t. †

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: outer surface, 2Ki 9:33, Ez Eze 33:30, Is 59:10 (in sim.); so [[זֶרֶם קִיר]] Is 25:4 (but Lo Kn Gr Di Du Che:Hpt al. rd. [[קׂר]]; JP Peters:JBL xi (1892), 46 prop. [[בָּדָד]] [as 28:2]); of temple 1Ki 6:5, 1Ki 6:5, 1Ki 6:6, cf. Ez Eze 41:6, Eze 41:6. †

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: both inner and outer v:Eze 41:17, v:Eze 41:20, v:Eze 41:25. †

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: thickness specified, Ez Eze 41:5, Eze 41:9, Eze 41:12, Eze 41:13 (of Ezekiel’s temple). †

definitions.title: f.
definitions.body: as enclosing, 2Ki 4:10 (of [[עֲלִיׇּה]], q.v.); as separating Ez Eze 43:8. †
wall  of (temple-)court Ez Eze 8:7, Eze 8:8, Eze 8:8 (in vision); of vineyard Nu 22:25, Nu 22:25 (J), of city Nu 35:4 (P), cf. [[חַחוֹמָה]] ´[[ק]]: Jos 2:15 (JE) the (inner) surface of the wall. †
